milestones.title: M1 Foundation + Intake
milestones.description: Foundation, security baseline, and intake lifecycle.

milestones.title: M2 Internal Workflow MVP
milestones.description: Real-time operations and internal clinical workflow.

milestones.title: M4 Validation + Handover
milestones.description: UAT, evaluation evidence, and final handover.

tickets.title: Establish branch strategy, PR rules, and CI checks
tickets.description: Set repository standards and CI quality gates.

tickets.title: Create Docker dev stack (app + postgres)
tickets.description: Create local environment parity for development and demo runs.

tickets.title: Implement core database schema and Prisma migrations
tickets.description: Define baseline entities and migration flow.

tickets.title: Implement authentication flow (credentials)
tickets.description: Provide secure login and session handling.

tickets.title: Implement RBAC for all paper-defined roles
tickets.description: Restrict permissions by role in API and UI.

tickets.title: Implement audit logging middleware foundation
tickets.description: Record role-sensitive actions in audit trail.

tickets.title: Build patient and company intake forms + APIs
tickets.description: Digitize patient and company registration workflows.

tickets.title: Implement PEME case creation and linkage to intake
tickets.description: Create case records and tie them to intake data.

tickets.title: Implement case and visit status state machine
tickets.description: Control valid lifecycle transitions for cases and visits.

tickets.title: Add duplicate detection and intake validation rules
tickets.description: Reduce bad data and repeated registrations.

tickets.title: Build reception queue board for active cases
tickets.description: Display current queue and case progression for reception.

tickets.title: Build department visit assignment and handoff APIs
tickets.description: Support inter-department case handoffs and visit updates.

tickets.title: Implement SSE channel for real-time queue updates
tickets.description: Stream queue changes to dashboards with low latency.

tickets.title: Build internal real-time dashboard by department
tickets.description: Provide live department status for operations staff.

tickets.title: Implement rush/priority queue discipline
tickets.description: Prioritize rush cases while preserving queue transparency.

tickets.title: Add queue timer metrics capture (wait/throughput basis)
tickets.description: Capture timestamps needed for KPI reporting.

tickets.title: Build result item entry workflow for nurse/physician
tickets.description: Enable structured recording of exam results.

tickets.title: Implement physician decision workflow
tickets.description: Capture fit/unfit/conditional decisions and status changes.

tickets.title: Implement releasing staff finalization with status lock
tickets.description: Finalize decisions and prevent accidental post-release edits.

tickets.title: Implement PDF result output for released cases
tickets.description: Generate downloadable result documents.

tickets.title: Enforce access and audit logs for result view/download
tickets.description: Track sensitive result access internally.

tickets.title: Implement external portal authentication and RBAC scope
tickets.description: Provide secure external login with limited permissions.

tickets.title: Implement external released-result view and download
tickets.description: Allow external users to access released results only.

tickets.title: Implement result-ready email notifications
tickets.description: Notify users when released results are available.

tickets.title: Implement privacy notice, retention config, and backup smoke test
tickets.description: Complete minimum compliance controls for MVP.

tickets.title: Prepare and run role-based UAT scripts
tickets.description: Validate end-to-end workflows with representative users.

tickets.title: Triage and fix high-impact pilot defects
tickets.description: Resolve major defects found during pilot and UAT.

tickets.title: Generate baseline vs post KPI report
tickets.description: Produce capstone metric comparison output.

tickets.title: Run SUS survey capture and summary
tickets.description: Capture and summarize usability feedback.

tickets.title: Finalize capstone docs, demo script, and handover sign-off
tickets.description: Package final evidence and complete project closeout.
